doc:
Vincent Lindon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Lindon 0 Vincent Lindon (born 15 July 1959) is a French actor and filmmaker who has been active for more than 30 years. At the 2015 Cannes Film Festival he won the award for Best Actor for his role in the film The Measure of a Man. He won the IFFI Best Actor Award (Male) at the 46th International Film Festival of India. Vincent_Lindon ( born 15_July_1959 ) is a_French_actor and filmmaker who has_been active for more_than_30_years . At the_2015_Cannes_Film_Festival he won the_award for Best_Actor for his_role in the_film The_Measure of a_Man . He won the_IFFI_Best_Actor_Award_(_Male_) at the_46th_International_Film_Festival of India .
